Race.SpecificTitle: PW Consolidated School Dist. No. 1 -- 8.24 Mills Continuation - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Consolidated School District No. 1 Proposition
(Millage Continuation)
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated School District No. 1 of the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy an eight and twenty-four hundredths (8.24) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in the District (an estimated $401,700 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of giving additional support to the public schools of the District, said millage to represent an eighty-two hundredths of a mill (.82) increase over the 7.42 mills tax authorized to be levied through the year 2018 pursuant to an election held on July 19, 2008?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Lake Providence -- 5.87 Mills Renewal - M&BOA - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Lake Providence Proposition
(Property Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Town of Lake Providence, State of Louisiana (the "Town"), levy a special tax of five and eighty-seven hundredths (5.87) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the Town (an estimated $65,450.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year) for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, with 2.61 mills thereof for operating, maintaining and/or purchasing vehicles, radio equipment and uniforms for the Police Department and 3.26 mills thereof for building, operating, maintaining and/or purchasing fire stations, fire trucks, uniforms and equipment for the Fire Department, said tax to be a renewal of a tax authorized to be levied through the year 2017 pursuant to an election held on July 21, 2007?
